content:
I think this Jira ticket makes sense:
https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-23708
can this be applied to the pattern as well? - it would make sense, I think
I'm very much opposed to the change. Rationale added as a comment to the tracker item.
Good point. The requirement I'd contribute to that is that we may want to say "this can be done by a nurse or by a specialized nurse or by the GP"
I'm happy to see performerType changed to 0..* - feel free to submit a change request :)
